title: I really enjoy Building on Supabase
description: Supabase is an excellent Firebase alternative that's fun to build on.

children.value: While I'm not opposed to propriatory platforms, I do appreciate the flexibility of not getting locked in.
Supabase has a really great and generous free plan.

title: My Productivity System
description: Other companies aren't just competing with each other for our attention, but with us directly.

children.value: A month or two ago I decided I was going to learn how to use Obsidian and create a Personal Knolwedge Management system. Getting the basics down takes a bit of work but it's not difficult to have a basic note taking system up and running in a few hours.

I originally used Nextcloud but had trouble keeping my safe synced between devices, particularily on mobile. My next attempt was to use Github but that too, was not suficient. Ultimately I installed Syncthing
I use a flexible combination of the Zettlekasten system and MOCs.
MOCs refers to Maps of Content. THey provide an index or table of conents for a particular area of study or topic.
